data.title: Director Feng Xiaogang Wins Best Actor
data.meta_description: Chinese director Feng Xiaogang, a reliab
data.text:
Chinese director Feng Xiaogang, a reliable box office hitter, has won the China Film Director's Guild's best actor award for his role in film Mr. Six.

Actors, producers and filmmakers gathered last night in Beijing for the China Film Directors Guild Awards.

In addition to Feng's best actor award, Mr. Six's director Guan Hu has also won Director of the Year and the movie was given the award for Film of the Year.

Source: chinadaily.com.cn
